summary.long: 3 John is a book of the New Testament.

verses.text:
The Elder,
To the beloved Gaius, whom I love in truth:
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be in health, just as your soul prospers.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: For I rejoiced greatly when brethren came and testified of the truth that is in you, just as you walk in the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, you do faithfully whatever you do for the brethren and for strangers,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: who have borne witness of your love before the church. If you send them forward on their journey in a manner worthy of God, you will do well,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: because they went forth for His nameâ€™s sake, taking nothing from the Gentiles.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we may become fellow workers for the truth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I wrote to the church, but Diotrephes, who loves to have the preeminence among them, does not receive us.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Therefore, if I come, I will call to mind his deeds which he does, prating against us with malicious words. And not content with that, he himself does not receive the brethren, and forbids those who wish to, putting them out of the church.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Beloved, do not imitate what is evil, but what is good. He who does good is of God, but he who does evil has not seen God.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Demetrius has a good testimony from all, and from the truth itself. And we also bear witness, and you know that our testimony is true.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: I had many things to write, but I do not wish to write to you with pen and ink;
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text:
but I hope to see you shortly, and we shall speak face to face.
Peace to you. Our friends greet you. Greet the friends by name.
verses.speaker: Narrator
